title: Increase hero logo image size

requirements.text: Increase the displayed size of the hero logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] by updating only that element’s Tailwind sizing classes in frontend/src/App.tsx (i.e., increase its height on mobile and desktop) without changing its src, alt text, container layout, or any other page elements.

quotes: Increase the size of the logo

acceptanceCriteria: Only the hero logo (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) changes; no other elements’ code or styling is modified.
The logo renders visibly larger than before at both mobile and md+ breakpoints (i.e., its Tailwind height classes are increased from the current values).
The logo image source path and alt text remain unchanged, and the hero overlay content (headings, buttons, gradient overlay, slider behavior) remains unchanged.

constraints: Apply the user instruction ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1].
Do not change any other sections, content, layout, links, or styling beyond what is required to increase the logo size.
nonGoals: Changing the logo image file, filename, or src path.
Adjusting the hero slider timing/transition or adding any new controls/animations.
Modifying typography, spacing, or button styles anywhere else on the page.
